TopicTitle: Physics "pulse" destroys large vehicle after going back to 1x in fast warp mode

Articles.Content:
I thought the fast warp mode was safe from physics bugs because that is how it works in KSP 1.  Unfortunately a "gravitational wave" seems to go through the ship while going back to 1x mode and this sometimes destroys everything.

Edited June 1, 2023 by Anth12
